@graph.name: Sleepcycle.io - World's #1 Sleep Cycle Calculator
@graph.description: The world's most trusted sleep cycle calculator with FREE AI health assessment. Calculate optimal bedtime and wake-up times based on 90-minute sleep cycles.

@graph.name: Sleep Cycle Calculator
@graph.description: AI-powered sleep cycle calculator with personalized health assessments

@graph.name: How to Use the Sleep Cycle Calculator
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to calculate your optimal bedtime and wake-up times

supply.name: Current time or desired wake-up time

step.name: Choose your calculation type
step.text: Select whether you want to find your bedtime (if you know when you want to wake up) or wake-up time (if you know when you'll go to bed)

step.name: Set your time
step.text: Use the time picker to select your desired wake-up time or bedtime

step.name: Get AI recommendations
step.text: Click calculate to receive personalized sleep times based on 90-minute cycles and get your FREE AI health assessment

@graph.name: Sleep Calculators Available
@graph.description: Complete list of sleep calculators for all ages
